mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrPsnlInfoModHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PSNL_INFO_MOD_HIST_SN , PSNL_INFO_MOD_HIST_TURN , MBR_NO , PSNL_INFO_MOD_DT , PSNL_INFO_UDT_SECT_CD , MOD_BF_VAL , MOD_AF_VAL , MOD_MBR_NO , MOD_ADMIN_ID , MOD_LC_SECT_CD , MOD_RESN_DSCR , ERP_TRNSMIS_YN , ERP_TRNSMIS_DT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_PSNL_INFO_MOD_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND PSNL_INFO_MOD_HIST_SN = #{psnlInfoModHistSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND PSNL_INFO_MOD_HIST_TURN = #{psnlInfoModHistTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
